漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2016-04-18：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2016-04-18：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2016-04-28：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2016-05-08：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-05-18：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-06-02：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 747盒子某处论坛可命令执行 详细说明：  Discuz论坛升级程序未删除，导致可远程命令执行http://122.112.12.135//utility/convert/index.php   漏洞证明：  
[*] 基本信息 [ 	Linux centos10.747.cn 4.2.8-1-pve #1 SMP Sat Mar 19 10:44:29 CET 2016 x86_64(www-data) ][/]$ cat /etc/hosts127.0.0.1 localhost.localdomain localhost localhost4.localdomain4 localhost4# Auto-generated hostname. Please do not remove this comment.127.0.1.1 centos10::1         localhost localhost.localdomain localhost6 localhost6.localdomain6127.0.1.1 centos10127.0.1.1 centos10127.0.1.1 centos10127.0.1.1 centos10127.0.1.1 centos10127.0.1.1 centos1010.0.2.39 centos10.747.cn centos10# --- BEGIN PVE ---10.0.2.39 centos10.747.cn centos10# --- END PVE ---[/]$ /sbin/ifconfig -aeth0      Link encap:Ethernet  HWaddr 32:30:66:66:36:63            inet addr:10.0.2.39  Bcast:10.0.2.255  Mask:255.255.255.0          inet6 addr: fe80::3030:66ff:fe66:3663/64 Scope:Link          UP BROADCAST RUNNING MULTICAST  MTU:1500  Metric:1          RX packets:2955129 errors:0 dropped:0 overruns:0 frame:0          TX packets:2960 errors:0 dropped:0 overruns:0 carrier:0          collisions:0 txqueuelen:1000           RX bytes:1857890722 (1.7 GiB)  TX bytes:12069336 (11.5 MiB)eth1      Link encap:Ethernet  HWaddr 3A:38:32:66:35:62            inet addr:122.112.12.135  Bcast:122.112.12.191  Mask:255.255.255.192          inet6 addr: fe80::3838:32ff:fe66:3562/64 Scope:Link          UP BROADCAST RUNNING MULTICAST  MTU:1500  Metric:1          RX packets:1260374 errors:0 dropped:0 overruns:0 frame:0          TX packets:491291 errors:0 dropped:0 overruns:0 carrier:0          collisions:0 txqueuelen:1000           RX bytes:112627898 (107.4 MiB)  TX bytes:79937356 (76.2 MiB)lo        Link encap:Local Loopback            inet addr:127.0.0.1  Mask:255.0.0.0          inet6 addr: ::1/128 Scope:Host          UP LOOPBACK RUNNING  MTU:65536  Metric:1          RX packets:18523 errors:0 dropped:0 overruns:0 frame:0          TX packets:18523 errors:0 dropped:0 overruns:0 carrier:0          collisions:0 txqueuelen:0           RX bytes:3148237 (3.0 MiB)  TX bytes:3148237 (3.0 MiB)[/]$

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：10  确认时间：2016-04-18 18:40 厂商回复： 感谢路人甲，请留下联系方式，好安排相关人员发放小礼品 最新状态： 暂无
